Today, the Causeway Coast is experiencing poor conditions with 4 ft @8s WSW swell and fresh 25 mph S winds, making it blown out across the board. Tomorrow, the swell picks up to 8 ft @15s WNW, but the fresh 19 mph S wind will still keep it messy. On the day after, it remains at 8 ft @12s W with stronger 31 mph SW winds, continuing the trend of challenging conditions. Best: tomorrow.
